mapper.insert: insert into graduation_pay_info (id, user_id, order_no, pay_platform, platform_number, platform_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platformNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now())
mapper.update: update graduation_pay_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_platform = #{payPlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_number = #{platformNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform_status = #{platformStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, order_no, pay_platform, platform_number, platform_status, create_time, update_time from graduation_pay_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, order_no, pay_platform, platform_number, platform_status, create_time, update_time from graduation_pay_info
